Create MMWR Calendar

mmwr_calendar.Rd

Calculate calendar with disease weeks plus start and end dates.

Usage

mmwr_calendar(year)

Arguments

year

Epidemologic year of interest.

Value

Dataframe.

Examples

mmwr_calendar(2024)
#>    Year Week      Start        End
#> 1  2024    1 2023-12-31 2024-01-06
#> 2  2024    2 2024-01-07 2024-01-13
#> 3  2024    3 2024-01-14 2024-01-20
#> 4  2024    4 2024-01-21 2024-01-27
#> 5  2024    5 2024-01-28 2024-02-03
#> 6  2024    6 2024-02-04 2024-02-10
#> 7  2024    7 2024-02-11 2024-02-17
#> 8  2024    8 2024-02-18 2024-02-24
#> 9  2024    9 2024-02-25 2024-03-02
#> 10 2024   10 2024-03-03 2024-03-09
#> 11 2024   11 2024-03-10 2024-03-16
#> 12 2024   12 2024-03-17 2024-03-23
#> 13 2024   13 2024-03-24 2024-03-30
#> 14 2024   14 2024-03-31 2024-04-06
#> 15 2024   15 2024-04-07 2024-04-13
#> 16 2024   16 2024-04-14 2024-04-20
#> 17 2024   17 2024-04-21 2024-04-27
#> 18 2024   18 2024-04-28 2024-05-04
#> 19 2024   19 2024-05-05 2024-05-11
#> 20 2024   20 2024-05-12 2024-05-18
#> 21 2024   21 2024-05-19 2024-05-25
#> 22 2024   22 2024-05-26 2024-06-01
#> 23 2024   23 2024-06-02 2024-06-08
#> 24 2024   24 2024-06-09 2024-06-15
#> 25 2024   25 2024-06-16 2024-06-22
#> 26 2024   26 2024-06-23 2024-06-29
#> 27 2024   27 2024-06-30 2024-07-06
#> 28 2024   28 2024-07-07 2024-07-13
#> 29 2024   29 2024-07-14 2024-07-20
#> 30 2024   30 2024-07-21 2024-07-27
#> 31 2024   31 2024-07-28 2024-08-03
#> 32 2024   32 2024-08-04 2024-08-10
#> 33 2024   33 2024-08-11 2024-08-17
#> 34 2024   34 2024-08-18 2024-08-24
#> 35 2024   35 2024-08-25 2024-08-31
#> 36 2024   36 2024-09-01 2024-09-07
#> 37 2024   37 2024-09-08 2024-09-14
#> 38 2024   38 2024-09-15 2024-09-21
#> 39 2024   39 2024-09-22 2024-09-28
#> 40 2024   40 2024-09-29 2024-10-05
#> 41 2024   41 2024-10-06 2024-10-12
#> 42 2024   42 2024-10-13 2024-10-19
#> 43 2024   43 2024-10-20 2024-10-26
#> 44 2024   44 2024-10-27 2024-11-02
#> 45 2024   45 2024-11-03 2024-11-09
#> 46 2024   46 2024-11-10 2024-11-16
#> 47 2024   47 2024-11-17 2024-11-23
#> 48 2024   48 2024-11-24 2024-11-30
#> 49 2024   49 2024-12-01 2024-12-07
#> 50 2024   50 2024-12-08 2024-12-14
#> 51 2024   51 2024-12-15 2024-12-21
#> 52 2024   52 2024-12-22 2024-12-28
